name: Mnemosyne (Senem, g.kirmizi, augurkan, ElifAyhan, ulkunurnar)
description:
We made our game inspired by the Dutch painter Escher's this work in 1935. We covered "being isolated in one's self and past". For this reason, we named our play the name of "Mnemosyne" the goddess of memory and remembrance, existing in Greek mythology from heaven and earth. The gameplay of our game has classical mechanics; for walking "WASD" and for interacting "E". As a result of this interaction, we left the meaning of the sound, visual and story completely to the player's mind.
